name: HIAS (Hebrew Immigrant Aid Society)
description: Provides humanitarian aid and advocacy for refugees and immigrants worldwide.

name: Jewish Family Service (JFS) Refugee & Immigrant Services
description: Supports refugees and immigrants in San Diego through various programs and services.

name: IsraAID
description: An Israeli-based humanitarian aid organization that provides disaster relief and development assistance to communities worldwide, including refugees.

name: Jewish Vocational Service (JVS) Boston
description: Empowers refugees and immigrants in the Boston area through education and employment services.

name: New Israel Fund
description: Supports social justice organizations in Israel, including those working with refugees and asylum seekers.

name: National Council of Jewish Women (NCJW) Immigrant Rights Initiative
description: Advocates for immigrant and refugee rights and provides support to vulnerable populations.

name: Jewish Community Services (JCS) of South Florida
description: Assists refugees and immigrants in South Florida with resettlement and support services.

name: Asylum Seeker Advocacy Project (ASAP)
description: Provides legal assistance and community support to asylum seekers in the United States.

name: Habonim Dror North America
description: A progressive Jewish youth movement that engages in social justice and supports refugee and immigrant causes.

name: HIAS Pennsylvania
description: Assists immigrants, refugees, and asylum seekers in Pennsylvania with legal and social services.

name: Jewish Coalition for Immigrant Justice NW
description: A network of Jewish organizations and individuals working for immigrant justice and refugee support in the Pacific Northwest.

name: T'ruah: The Rabbinic Call for Human Rights
description: Mobilizes rabbis and their communities to advocate for human rights, including refugee and immigrant rights.

name: Jewish Family and Children's Services (JFCS) San Francisco
description: Provides comprehensive services, including refugee resettlement, to individuals and families in the San Francisco Bay Area.

name: Jewish Council for Public Affairs (JCPA)
description: Advocates for social justice and works on various policy issues, including immigration and refugees.

name: HIAS Chicago
description: Provides legal and social services to immigrants, refugees, and asylum seekers in the Chicago area.

name: Repair the World
description: Engages Jewish young adults in volunteer service and advocacy, including projects that support immigrants and refugees.

name: Jewish Family Service (JFS) Columbus
description: Offers resettlement and support services to refugees and immigrants in Columbus, Ohio.

name: Jewish Federation of Greater Los Angeles
description: Supports various charitable organizations, including those that aid refugees and immigrants in Los Angeles.

name: Jewish Family and Community Services (JFCS) Arizona
description: Provides comprehensive social services, including refugee resettlement, in Arizona.
